projects.title: projects
projects.subtitle: Reduce the weight of your images by up to 50% and convert them from formats like PNG, JPG or JPEG to WebP quickly and easily.

path.title: Path
path.p1: Since I started my working life at the age of 18, I have maintained constant progress, facing the challenges that life presents along the way.
path.p2: With over 10 years of experience in logistics and inventory management, 1 year in production, and 1 year as a web developer, I have the necessary expertise to guide companies in creating and maintaining custom software tailored to their specific needs.
path.p3: This year as a web developer has allowed me to evolve in ways I never imagined. Initially, I started using Laravel with PHP, a language I was not familiar with, but thanks to my colleagues' help, we managed to carry out the company's most ambitious project: an employee application.
path.p4: Now I have worked with technologies that I had not used professionally before, but rather as a hobby, which has strengthened my knowledge in areas such as Astro, Vue, CSS, Sass, Tailwind, among others.
path.p5: During this time, I have been able to undertake amazing projects for the company I work for. These projects can be found in the section of this website cataloged as external projects.

iLike.title: And... what do I like?
iLike.p1: I have a great passion for my family, web development, and tasks that  require mental effort.
iLike.p2: I value interpersonal relationships and seek to enrich my knowledge through interaction with others.
iLike.p3: I am enthusiastic about tackling every activity with passion and dedication. Additionally, I enjoy spending time with pleasant and enriching people. I consider myself a sociable person, open to new challenges.
iLike.p4: My social life does not hinder my work commitment, which allows me to lead a peaceful and harmonious life, always with a deep love for animals and nature.
iLike.p5: As a final touch to my routine, a cup of coffee is an essential element on my table.
iLike.p6: My passion for development has transcended more than I had imagined, with a GitHub repository that continues to grow. I also enjoy creating my own components in pure TypeScript, some of which can be viewed on this website, categorized as internal projects.
iLike.p7a: Finally, my most cherished product, which I have not been able to maintain due to work commitments, is my set of React components hosted on
iLike.p7b: All documentation in English and Spanish can be found at:
iLike.p8: Finally, as a personal goal I want to learn Rust
